author: s1na
content: Another complaint I heard recently about eth_getLogs is that it silently omits results for non-existent blocks. E.g. if I query logs for block 5 to 10 and the node's head is at 9, users get logs for 5-9 and they might not realize that 10 was omitted because node hasn't seen it yet.

author: tersec
content: e.g., https://pureth.guide/log-value-index/ (EIP-7745 and other parts of EIP-7919) address this
